content:
clustermesh-apiserver kvstoremesh-dbg 
 CLI for interacting with KVStoreMesh 
 Options 
   -h, --help          help for kvstoremesh-dbg
  -H, --host string   URI to server-side API (default "localhost:9889")
 
 SEE ALSO 
 
 clustermesh-apiserver 	 - Run the ClusterMesh apiserver 
 clustermesh-apiserver kvstoremesh-dbg status 	 - Display status of remote clusters 
 clustermesh-apiserver kvstoremesh-dbg troubleshoot 	 - Troubleshoot connectivity towards the local etcd kvstore and remote clusters
